briefTitle: A Study of Tirzepatide (LY3298176) in Participants With Obesity or Overweight
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Tirzepatide Once Weekly in Participants Without Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Obesity or Are Overweight With Weight- Related Comorbidities: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial (SURMOUNT-1)
summary: This is a study of tirzepatide in participants with overweight and obesity. The main purpose is to learn more about how tirzepatide affects body weight. The study has two phases: A main phase and an extension phase. The main phase of the study will last 72 weeks. Participants with prediabetes will continue in the extension for another 2 years.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Body Weight (Primary Treatment Period)
